mapper.select: SELECT ins_sgg_cd as insSggCd, ins_sgg_nm as insSggNm, ins_client as insClient, ins_start_dt as insStartDt, ins_end_dt as insEndDt, ins_company as insCompany, ins_method as insMethod, ins_url as insUrl FROM ins WHERE ins_sgg_nm = #{insSggNm} AND TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(ins_start_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY') = TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{insStartDt}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY')

SELECT grnt.grnt_sgg_year_cd, grnt_nm, grnt_content, grnt_amount FROM grnt INNER JOIN ins ON grnt.grnt_sgg_year_cd = ins.grnt_sgg_year_cd WHERE ins_sgg_nm = #{insSggNm} AND TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(ins_start_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY') = TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{insStartDt}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY')
SELECT DISTINCT ins_sgg_nm as insSggNm FROM ins ORDER BY insSggNm
